name: asklio-challenge
description: Please organize, design, test, and deploy your code (locally on your machine is fine) as if it were going into production. Then send us a link to the hosted repository (e.g. Github, Bitbucket...).

scripts.main: node --no-deprecation --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' main.ts
